section.name: About Common Content
section.p:
Some of the content in Open Identity Platform core documentation is common to all books.
This common content is provided as a separate Maven project that is maintained independently of any particular documentation set.
The common Open Identity Platform content includes text and images in formats suitable for inclusion in DocBook 5 XML based core documentation.
In order to use the common content, get a common content artifact by using the maven-dependency-plugin goal, unpack.
